And<S>2532</S> there came<S>2064</S> one<S>1520</S> of<S>1537</S> the seven<S>2033</S> angels<S>32</S> which<S>3588</S> had<S>2192</S> the seven<S>2033</S> vials<S>5357</S>, and<S>2532</S> talked<S>2980</S> with<S>3326</S> me<S>1700</S>, saying<S>3004</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, Come hither<S>1204</S>; I will shew<S>1166</S> unto thee<S>4671</S> the judgment<S>2917</S> of the great<S>3173</S> whore<S>4204</S> that sitteth<S>2521</S> upon<S>1909</S> many<S>4183</S> waters<S>5204</S>:
With<S>3326</S> whom<S>3739</S> the kings<S>935</S> of the earth<S>1093</S> have committed fornication<S>4203</S>, and<S>2532</S> the inhabitants<S>2730</S> of the earth<S>1093</S> have been made drunk<S>3184</S> with<S>1537</S> the wine<S>3631</S> of her<S>846</S> fornication<S>4202</S>.
So<S>2532</S> he carried<S>667</S> me<S>3165</S> away<S>667</S> in<S>1722</S> the spirit<S>4151</S> into<S>1519</S> the wilderness<S>2048</S>: and<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> a woman<S>1135</S> sit<S>2521</S> upon<S>1909</S> a scarlet coloured<S>2847</S> beast<S>2342</S>, full of<S>1073</S> names<S>3686</S> of blasphemy<S>988</S>, having<S>2192</S> seven<S>2033</S> heads<S>2776</S> and<S>2532</S> ten<S>1176</S> horns<S>2768</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the woman<S>1135</S> was<S>2258</S> arrayed<S>4016</S> in purple<S>4209</S> and<S>2532</S> scarlet colour<S>2847</S>, and<S>2532</S> decked<S>5558</S> with gold<S>5557</S> and<S>2532</S> precious<S>5093</S> stones<S>3037</S> and<S>2532</S> pearls<S>3135</S>, having<S>2192</S> a golden<S>5552</S> cup<S>4221</S> in<S>1722</S> her<S>846</S> hand<S>5495</S> full of<S>1073</S> abominations<S>946</S> and<S>2532</S> filthiness<S>168</S> of her<S>846</S> fornication<S>4202</S>: <sup>decked: Gr. gilded</sup>
And<S>2532</S> upon<S>1909</S> her<S>846</S> forehead<S>3359</S> was a name<S>3686</S> written<S>1125</S>, MYSTERY<S>3466</S>, BABYLON<S>897</S> THE GREAT<S>3173</S>, THE MOTHER<S>3384</S> OF HARLOTS<S>4204</S> AND<S>2532</S> ABOMINATIONS<S>946</S> OF THE EARTH<S>1093</S>. <sup>harlots: or, fornications</sup>
And<S>2532</S> I saw<S>1492</S> the woman<S>1135</S> drunken<S>3184</S> with<S>1537</S> the blood<S>129</S> of the saints<S>40</S>, and<S>2532</S> with<S>1537</S> the blood<S>129</S> of the martyrs<S>3144</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S>: and<S>2532</S> when I saw<S>1492</S> her<S>846</S>, I wondered<S>2296</S> with great<S>3173</S> admiration<S>2295</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the angel<S>32</S> said<S>2036</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, Wherefore<S>1302</S> didst thou marvel<S>2296</S>? I<S>1473</S> will tell<S>2046</S> thee<S>4671</S> the mystery<S>3466</S> of the woman<S>1135</S>, and<S>2532</S> of the beast<S>2342</S> that carrieth<S>941</S> her<S>846</S>, which<S>3588</S> hath<S>2192</S> the seven<S>2033</S> heads<S>2776</S> and<S>2532</S> ten<S>1176</S> horns<S>2768</S>.
The beast<S>2342</S> that<S>3739</S> thou sawest<S>1492</S> was<S>2258</S>, and<S>2532</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S>; and<S>2532</S> shall<S>3195</S> ascend<S>305</S> out of<S>1537</S> the bottomless pit<S>12</S>, and<S>2532</S> go<S>5217</S> into<S>1519</S> perdition<S>684</S>: and<S>2532</S> they that dwell<S>2730</S> on<S>1909</S> the earth<S>1093</S> shall wonder<S>2296</S>, whose<S>3739</S> names<S>3686</S> were<S>1125</S> not<S>3756</S> written<S>1125</S> in<S>1909</S> the book<S>975</S> of life<S>2222</S> from<S>575</S> the foundation<S>2602</S> of the world<S>2889</S>, when they behold<S>991</S> the beast<S>2342</S> that was<S>3748</S> <S>2258</S>, and<S>2532</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S>, and yet<S>2539</S> is<S>2076</S>.
And here<S>5602</S> is the mind<S>3563</S> which<S>3588</S> hath<S>2192</S> wisdom<S>4678</S>. The seven<S>2033</S> heads<S>2776</S> are<S>1526</S> seven<S>2033</S> mountains<S>3735</S>, on<S>1909</S> which<S>846</S> the woman<S>1135</S> sitteth<S>2521</S> <S>3699</S>.
And<S>2532</S> there are<S>1526</S> seven<S>2033</S> kings<S>935</S>: five<S>4002</S> are fallen<S>4098</S>, and<S>2532</S> one<S>1520</S> is<S>2076</S>, and the other<S>243</S> is<S>2064</S> not yet<S>3768</S> come<S>2064</S>; and<S>2532</S> when<S>3752</S> he cometh<S>2064</S>, he<S>846</S> must<S>1163</S> continue<S>3306</S> a short space<S>3641</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the beast<S>2342</S> that<S>3739</S> was<S>2258</S>, and<S>2532</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S>, even<S>2532</S> he<S>846</S> is<S>2076</S> the eighth<S>3590</S>, and<S>2532</S> is<S>2076</S> of<S>1537</S> the seven<S>2033</S>, and<S>2532</S> goeth<S>5217</S> into<S>1519</S> perdition<S>684</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the ten<S>1176</S> horns<S>2768</S> which<S>3739</S> thou sawest<S>1492</S> are<S>1526</S> ten<S>1176</S> kings<S>935</S>, which<S>3748</S> have received<S>2983</S> no<S>3768</S> kingdom<S>932</S> as yet<S>3768</S>; but<S>235</S> receive<S>2983</S> power<S>1849</S> as<S>5613</S> kings<S>935</S> one<S>3391</S> hour<S>5610</S> with<S>3326</S> the beast<S>2342</S>.
These<S>3778</S> have<S>2192</S> one<S>3391</S> mind<S>1106</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall give<S>1239</S> their<S>1438</S> power<S>1411</S> and<S>2532</S> strength<S>1849</S> unto the beast<S>2342</S>.
These<S>3778</S> shall make war<S>4170</S> with<S>3326</S> the Lamb<S>721</S>, and<S>2532</S> the Lamb<S>721</S> shall overcome<S>3528</S> them<S>846</S>: for<S>3754</S> he is<S>2076</S> Lord<S>2962</S> of lords<S>2962</S>, and<S>2532</S> King<S>935</S> of kings<S>935</S>: and<S>2532</S> they that are with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S> are called<S>2822</S>, and<S>2532</S> chosen<S>1588</S>, and<S>2532</S> faithful<S>4103</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he saith<S>3004</S> unto me<S>3427</S>, The waters<S>5204</S> which<S>3739</S> thou sawest<S>1492</S>, where<S>3757</S> the whore<S>4204</S> sitteth<S>2521</S>, are<S>1526</S> peoples<S>2992</S>, and<S>2532</S> multitudes<S>3793</S>, and<S>2532</S> nations<S>1484</S>, and<S>2532</S> tongues<S>1100</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the ten<S>1176</S> horns<S>2768</S> which<S>3739</S> thou sawest<S>1492</S> upon<S>1909</S> the beast<S>2342</S>, these<S>3778</S> shall hate<S>3404</S> the whore<S>4204</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall make<S>4160</S> her<S>846</S> desolate<S>2049</S> and<S>2532</S> naked<S>1131</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall eat<S>5315</S> her<S>846</S> flesh<S>4561</S>, and<S>2532</S> burn<S>2618</S> her<S>846</S> with<S>1722</S> fire<S>4442</S>.
For<S>1063</S> God<S>2316</S> hath put<S>1325</S> in<S>1519</S> their<S>846</S> hearts<S>2588</S> to fulfil<S>4160</S> his<S>846</S> will<S>1106</S>, and<S>2532</S> to agree<S>4160</S> <S>3391</S> <S>1106</S>, and<S>2532</S> give<S>1325</S> their<S>846</S> kingdom<S>932</S> unto the beast<S>2342</S>, until<S>891</S> the words<S>4487</S> of God<S>2316</S> shall be fulfilled<S>5055</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the woman<S>1135</S> which<S>3739</S> thou sawest<S>1492</S> is<S>2076</S> that great<S>3173</S> city<S>4172</S>, which<S>3588</S> reigneth<S>2192</S> <S>932</S> over<S>1909</S> the kings<S>935</S> of the earth<S>1093</S>.
